title: Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
description: Authoritative consolidated report for Sale 35 (1st/2nd Sept 2025). Synthesized from transaction data, multiple brokers, and weather data. Total Offered: 7,694,424 kg. Auction Avg: $1.95.

title: Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 34 (1st/2nd Sept 2025). Total offerings: 5.10 M/Kgs. Good general demand. Best Westerns irregular; Uva seasonal teas sold well. [Source: F&W]

title: Limbe Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 35 (27th Aug 2025). Fair demand for the 977,064 kilos on offer. Overall absorption similar to last sale. [Source: General]

title: India Regional Consolidated Report - Week 34, 2025
description: Regional summary for Week 34 (Ending 23rd Aug 2025). Includes statistics for Kolkata, Guwahati, Siliguri, and South India, plus World Crop comparison. [Source: Contemporary]

title: Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 34, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 34 (27th Aug 2025). Good demand at irregular rates. Auction Avg: $1.97. [Source: ITBB]

title: Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 34, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 32 (19th/20th Aug 2025). Total Quantity Sold: 5.19 M/Kgs. Auction Avg: LKR 1404.86. Good general demand. [Source: Asia Siyaka]

title: Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 33, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 33 (26th/27th Aug 2025). Total offerings: 5.19 M/Kgs. Good general demand. [Source: F&W]

title: Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 33, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 33 (18th/19th Aug 2025). Total offerings: 10.27 M/Kgs. Good general demand prevailed; 32.13% remained unsold. [Source: ATB]

title: Jakarta Consolidated Report - Week 33, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 33 (27th Aug 2025). Better demand with 71% sold. Includes detailed buyer activity. [Source: LES]

title: Kolkata Consolidated Report - Week 32, 2025
description: Consolidated report for Sale 32. CTC: Good demand. Liquoring Assams tended irregularly easier. Orthodox: Strong demand. [Source: J Thomas]
